mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into partner (`NAME`, `TYPE`, USER_ID, ACCESS_KEY, SECRET_KEY, `COMMENT`, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update partner set `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `TYPE` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, ACCESS_KEY = #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRET_KEY = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `COMMENT` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, `NAME`, `TYPE`, USER_ID, ACCESS_KEY, SECRET_KEY, `COMMENT`, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from partner where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, `NAME`, `TYPE`, USER_ID, ACCESS_KEY, SECRET_KEY, `COMMENT`, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from partner
